channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- DB2 for Linux and UNIX
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- DB2 for Linux and UNIX

item.title: CVE-2020-4945|2024-09-16T16:42:40.242Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%20and%20unix
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.5 could allow an authenticated user to overwrite arbirary files due to improper group permissions. IBM X-Force ID: 191945.
